name: py-flit-scm

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
A PEP 518 build backend that uses setuptools_scm to generate a version
file from your version control system, then flit to build the package.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: py-tomli
dependencies.description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.

dependent_to.name: py-exceptiongroup
dependent_to.description:
A backport of the BaseExceptionGroup and ExceptionGroup classes from
Python 3.11.
